archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0817
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Fraud Manager I want to ensure all customer or employee accounts viewed by a representative of Vodafone are logged and easily accessible to me to review

properties.value: This one is about storing access to customer accounts by VF employee in CRM or via spectate mode. Both CRM and via spectate. Logs should be visible in CRM both in a context of an employee and in context of a customer account. A nice to have would be to able to also see note/reason why an employee did the interaction. OOTB extension is needed to register Activiti everytime a user access customer data (enters 360 view of the customer)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
